meanings.def: a device that measures and records the amount of electricity, gas, water, etc. that you have used or the time and distance you have travelled, etc.
examples: A man came to read the gas meter.
The cab driver left the meter running while he waited for us.
Installing a smart meter will allow you to see how much water you are using in real time.

meanings.def: a machine next to the road that you put money into when you park your car next to it
a device for measuring the thing mentioned
a unit for measuring length; a hundred centimetres
examples: an athlete running at 10 meters per second

meanings.def: used in the name of races
examples: Who holds the record in the 100 meters?

meanings.def: the arrangement of strong and weak stresses in lines of poetry that produces the rhythm; a particular example of this
to measure something (for example how much gas, electricity, etc. has been used) using a meter
